name: Seacrets
description:
Discover and uncover

Delve into the deepest nooks of the undiscovered seas - travel about and find out what the waves have long covered beneath their great mass. It is up to you and your trusty submarine to uncover and bring back to life the stories of those long lost to the treacherous winds.

Unity Game Jam

Game prepared for the 2020 Unity Game Jam. Download the Windows Edition to witness the prototype in its full glory.
